subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chicago’s Thabo Sefolosha, a rookie guard and the first player from Switzerland to play in the N.B.A., gamely guarded Miami’s Dwyane Wade during their first-round game.
snippet: Chicago’s Thabo Sefolosha, a rookie guard and the first player from Switzerland to play in the N.B.A., gamely guarded Miami’s Dwyane Wade during their first-round game.
